welcome:
Hi, Welcome to my online portfolio, please give me###seconds to introduce my self.

My name is Louay Hamada and I'm a Software Engineer, I have been studying web development since 2006 and I develope primarily with PHP and Node.js, though I have a good knownledge of Python.

During 11 years of professional work with clients from around the world, I used to provide responsive front end interfaces and back end development, create WordPress themes and plugins, Single Page and Progressive Web Applications, meet both technical and consumer needs, and see through a project from conception to the end product. Also I got the ability to work with many frameworks, and client and server side languages, as well as working on brownfield projects.

I started my career as a freelancer at Khamsat.com Marketplace where I built some functional and well optimized websites for small businesses. I worked with more than 30 clients with a total rating of 100% and gained a good experience that helped me move to a higher level in my professional career and I'm still working to achieve more higher levels.

When I'm not working on client projects, I'm either reading something, sharing my knowledge with developers on Stack Overflow Community or learning new things and finding new ways to bring more value to my clients.

On my personal website you will be taken in a virtual journey to the environment that I live in everyday, which is "Text Editor", between the lines of code. You can read more About me, my services and skills, check out some of my work at Portfolio or visit Contact me section if you have any questions or to enquire about hiring me.

Thank you, Enjoy;
contact:
Please fill out the form below to enquire about hiring me or if you have any questions. Please introduce your project to get a quote based on your requirements. Specify a budget and an ideal completion date helps me give you the best solution. I'll get in touch with you as soon as possible and you should expect to hear from me within 24 hours or so.

You can also find me on LinkedIn, Github, Stack Overflow, Twitter or Telegram.
